alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 30 at 3:47AM CDT until March 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...For the Winter Weather Advisory tonight, plan on slippery road conditions. For the Blizzard Watch Friday, travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
